about_the_game:
Episode 5 for Games&Girls. Episode 1 is required!

Story:
One year after Episode 4 the protagonist and his girlfriends escape from Area 42. They end up in Las Vegas, Nevada. What will happen to them?

Enjoy the final Episode of Games&Girls for free!

Features:
-Anime art
-2 different endings
-HD Resolution
-Adult Content
-Steam Achievements

content_descriptors.notes: May contain implied nudity and sexual suggestive content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card

name: Games&Girls Episode 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card

short_description: Episode 5 for Games&Girls. The Story starts after the good end of Episode 4.
